EVALUATION.INSERT_PHOTOS: Please insert 3 to 6 photos of the evaluated service
EVALUATION.SERVICE_START_DATE: Expected start date of the service
EVALUATION.CLICK_TO_ADD_PHOTO: Click to add a photo of the executed service
EVALUATION.UNSAVED_CHANGES_CONFIRMATION: Unsaved changes will be lost, confirm?
EVALUATION.UNSAVED_CHANGES_CONFIRM: Unsaved changes will be lost, confirm?
EVALUATION.ERROR_REQUIRED_START_DATE: It is necessary to inform the actual start date of the service!
EVALUATION.ERROR_REQUIRED_END_DATE: It is necessary to inform the actual end date of the service!
EVALUATION.ERROR_END_DATE_BEFORE_START: The service completion date cannot be earlier than the start date!
EVALUATION.ERROR_END_DATE_AFTER_TODAY: The service completion date cannot be later than today!
EVALUATION.ERROR_REQUIRED_EXECUTOR: It is necessary to inform at least one Executor Employee!
EVALUATION.ERROR_REQUIRED_EVALUATOR: It is necessary to inform at least one Evaluator!
EVALUATION.ERROR_REQUIRED_RESULT: It is necessary to inform the result of {{parameterName}}!
EVALUATION.ERROR_TOTAL_PERCENTAGE: The total sum of the Executors' allocation percentages must be equal to 100!
EVALUATION.ERROR_ZERO_PERCENTAGE: It is not possible to assign a 0% allocation to an executor!
EVALUATION.ERROR_DUPLICATE_EXECUTORS: It is not possible to insert duplicate executors!

SETTINGS.NEW_REMUNERATION_ERROR: The new remuneration must be greater than the current one!

SERVICE.TAMANHO_SERVICO: Size of the service to be performed
SERVICE.VALOR_UNITARIO_TOOLTIP: Unit value per unit of measure
SERVICE.DATA_PREVISTA_INICIO_TOOLTIP: Expected start date of the service
SERVICE.DATA_PREVISTA_TERMINO_TOOLTIP: Expected end date of the service
SERVICE.INFO_GERAL_CADASTRO_LOTE: General information about batch service registration:
SERVICE.INCLUSAO_VARIOS_SERVICOS: You can include multiple services through a .xlsx file;
SERVICE.ARQUIVO_PADRAO_PLANILHA: The file must follow the standard of the spreadsheet provided by the system.
SERVICE.NOME_CONSTRUTORA_CENTRO_CUSTO: The name of the Construction Company and the name of the Cost Center are mandatory and must be the same as those registered in the system;
SERVICE.CAMPOS_OBRIGATORIOS_NIVEL1_NIVEL2: The fields 1st Level of location and 2nd Level of location are mandatory;
SERVICE.CAMPOS_OPCIONAIS_NIVEL3_NIVEL4: The fields 3rd Level of location and 4th Level of location are optional;
SERVICE.LOCALIZACAO_DIFERENTE: Any location distribution different from the one registered in the system will be registered as a new location;
SERVICE.TIPO_SERVICO_OBRIGATORIO: The Service Type is mandatory and must be the same as one already registered in the system;
SERVICE.DIMENSAO_MAIOR_ZERO: The Dimension must be a number greater than or equal to zero;
SERVICE.UNIDADE_MEDIDA_SIGLA: The Unit of measure is a mandatory acronym and must be one already existing in the system;
SERVICE.VALOR_UNITARIO_MAIOR_ZERO: The Unit Value must be a number greater than or equal to zero;
SERVICE.DATA_PREVISTA_INICIO_TERMINO: The Expected Start Date and Expected End Date are mandatory;
SERVICE.VALOR_TOTAL_OPCIONAL: The total value field is the multiplication of the dimension by the unit value, its filling is optional as the system already performs this calculation;
SERVICE.ALTERACAO_ORDEM_COLUNAS: Changing the order or number of columns in the provided template spreadsheet will result in an error in the registration.
SERVICE.PLANILHA_NAO_ATENDE_REQUISITOS: If the inserted spreadsheet does not meet any of the above requirements, the inclusion will not be carried out!
SERVICE.CLIQUE_OU_ARRASTE: Click or drag to upload .xlsx file
SERVICE.ERRO_SERVICO_EXISTENTE: A service is already registered at this location with the same type of service!
SERVICE.ERRO_NENHUMA_ALTERACAO: No changes detected! Task not updated!
SERVICE.ERRO_CENTRO_CUSTO_OBRIGATORIO: It is mandatory to inform the cost center!
SERVICE.ERRO_TIPO_SERVICO_OBRIGATORIO: It is mandatory to inform the type of service!
SERVICE.ERRO_LOCAL_EXECUCAO_OBRIGATORIO: It is mandatory to inform the location of service execution!
SERVICE.ERRO_DIMENSAO_OBRIGATORIO: It is mandatory to inform the dimension of the service!
SERVICE.ERRO_DATA_INICIO_OBRIGATORIO: It is mandatory to inform the expected start date of the service!
SERVICE.ERRO_DATA_FINAL_OBRIGATORIO: It is mandatory to inform the expected end date of the service!
SERVICE.ERRO_DATA_INICIO_POSTERIOR: The expected start date cannot be later than the expected end date!
SERVICE.ERRO_VALOR_UNITARIO_OBRIGATORIO: It is mandatory to inform the unit value of the service!
SERVICE.EXCLUIR_HTML:
Do you really want to delete the Service?
This action is irreversible!
SERVICE.ERRO_AVALIACAO_EXISTENTE: This service already has an assessment and cannot be deleted!

UNIT-OF-MEASURE.UNIDADE_EXISTENTE: A unit of measure with this abbreviation already exists!

UNIT-OF-MEASURE.SIGLA_MAX_CARACTERES: The 'Unit of Measure Abbreviation' field must have at most 4 characters!

UNIT-OF-MEASURE.DESCRICAO_MAX_CARACTERES: The 'Unit of Measure Description' field must have at most 254 characters!

SERVICE-TYPES.FIFTH_PARAM_LENGTH: The '5th Evaluation Parameter' field must be at least 3 and at most 254 characters!
SERVICE-TYPES.SIXTH_PARAM_LENGTH: The '6th Evaluation Parameter' field must be at least 6 and at most 254 characters!
SERVICE-TYPES.SEVENTH_PARAM_LENGTH: The '7th Evaluation Parameter' field must be at least 6 and at most 254 characters!
SERVICE-TYPES.EIGHTH_PARAM_LENGTH: The '8th Evaluation Parameter' field must be at least 3 and at most 254 characters!
SERVICE-TYPES.NINTH_PARAM_LENGTH: The '9th Evaluation Parameter' field must be at least 3 and at most 254 characters!
SERVICE-TYPES.TENTH_PARAM_LENGTH: The '10th Evaluation Parameter' field must be at least 3 and at most 254 characters!
